Name: CreaVures
About the game: Take control of five cute, mystical creatures of miniature proportions called CreaVures. CreaVures always travel in pairs, and they must use their special abilities to help each other solve interesting platforming puzzles. Set in a world with beautiful phosphorescent colors, these tiny creatures journey to save their homeland and restore light to their dying forest. Key Features: Guide 5 CreaVures, two at a time, through beautiful and magical habitats & discover their unique abilities Jump, glide, swing, roll, and bounce through 18 levels of interactive, physics-based puzzle platforming as well as epic boss battles Use CreaVures together to complete puzzles in different ways Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of CreaVures Atmospheric music Lovable characters in whimsical cutscenes Creavures now speak 6 different languages! English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, and Dutch
